page.title: 13POPULATION MOBILITY
page.content: We have made a survey about the children in Littlemill Primary School. There are only two classes,because there are not many pupils in the school.Obviously the classes are composite.The young class has 13 pupils aged between 5 and 8 years of age.The older class has 19 pupils aged between 9 and 12.This makes a total of 32 pupils.The children come from 24 families. We looked back through the old school register and found that only 22 pupils have never been in another school. Ten of our present pupils are incomers. We also found out that of our 24 families ,17 have always lived in the village and 7 are incomers.These figures show that there has been a movement of the local people mainly because of unemployment.
